name: Project Owner Template
description: Monitor a GitHub project's health: deployments, PRs, commits, issues, and blockers

schedule.rationale: Every 12 hours provides 2 check-ins per day without being too frequent

payload.message:
Review PROJECT_NAME (GitHub: GITHUB_OWNER/REPO_NAME, DEPLOYMENT_PLATFORM deployment).

Check:
1. Deployment status
2. Open PRs & recent commits
3. Issues/blockers

Reply with:
- 游릭 Green: Everything healthy, nothing blocking
- 游리 Yellow: Minor issues, needs attention soon
- 游댮 Red: Critical issue requiring immediate action

Then 2-3 bullet points max:
- [What needs doing]
- [What's blocking]
- [Quick win suggestion]

Keep it under 500 chars. Focus: progress and blockers only.

configuration.customize: Replace PROJECT_NAME, GITHUB_OWNER/REPO_NAME, DEPLOYMENT_PLATFORM, and YOUR_TELEGRAM_ID
configuration.schedule: Adjust everyMs for different check-in frequency (21600000 = 6h, 86400000 = 24h)
configuration.delivery: Change 'channel' to your preferred platform (discord, slack, etc.)
configuration.char_limit: The 500 char limit prevents overwhelming messages. Increase if needed.
configuration.status_emoji: 游릭游리游댮 provide at-a-glance health status

recommendedFor: Teams wanting automated project health checks
usagePattern: Clone this job for each project you want to monitor. Rename each with the project name.
